items.title: Christmas weather forecast: Heavy rain in California to record high temps
items.description: This year is expected to be the busiest on record for holiday travel, but rough weather can make getting to your Christmas destination even harder.

items.title: Justice Department releases additional documents from Epstein files
items.description: The Justice Department on Monday released additional documents from its files on the convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

items.title: 5 dead, 1 missing after Mexican Navy plane crashes in Texas
items.description: Five people were killed after a small plane belonging to the Mexican Navy crashed in Galveston, Texas, on Monday, officials said in a statement.
